verses.verse: <S%G80><s%> My Brethren, <S%G3450><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Respect Of Persons <S%G4382><s%> Do Have <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, Lord <S%G5547><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Glory; <S%G1391><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> May Have Come <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4864><s%> Your Synagogue <S%G5216><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> With Gold Rings <S%G5554><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Apparel <S%G2066><s%> Splendid, <S%G2986><s%> <S%G1525><s%> And May Have Come In <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> A Poor <S%G4434><s%> Man In <S%G1722><s%> Vile <S%G4508><s%> Apparel, <S%G2066><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Ye May Have Looked <S%G1914><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Wears <S%G5409><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apparel <S%G2066><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Splendid, <S%G2986><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Have Said <S%G2036><s%> , To Him, <S%G846><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Sit Thou <S%G2521><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> Well, <S%G2573><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Poor <S%G4434><s%> May Have Said, <S%G2036><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Stand Thou <S%G2476><s%> There, <S%G1563><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Sit Thou <S%G2521><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5286><s%> My Footstool : <S%G3450><s%>

Also <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Did Ye Make A Difference <S%G1252><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> Judges Having <S%G2923><s%> Reasonings <S%G1261><s%> Evil? <S%G4190><s%>

Hear, <S%G191><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Beloved : <S%G27><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Did Chose <S%G1586><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Poor <S%G4434><s%> <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> , Of This, <S%G5127><s%> Rich <S%G4145><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Heirs <S%G2818><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Promised <S%G1861><s%> To Those That <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G25><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Dishonoured <S%G818><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Poor Man <S%G4434><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rich <S%G4145><s%> Do Oppress <S%G2616><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> And Not <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Do Drag <S%G1670><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Before The <S%G1519><s%> Tribunals? <S%G2922><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Do Blaspheme <S%G987><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Called <S%G1941><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> You? <S%G5209><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Indeed The <S%G3305><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Ye Keep <S%G5055><s%> Royal <S%G937><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scripture, <S%G1124><s%> Thou Shalt Love <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4139><s%> Thy Neighbour <S%G4675><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Thyself, <S%G4572><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Ye Do. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> , Ye Have Respect Of Persons, <S%G4380><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> Ye Work, <S%G2038><s%> Being Convinced <S%G1651><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Transgressors. <S%G3848><s%>

<S%G3748><s%> For Whosoever <S%G1063><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> , Shall Keep, <S%G5083><s%> Shall Stumble <S%G4417><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> One Point, <S%G1520><s%> Ha Has Become <S%G1096><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Guilty. <S%G1777><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For He Who <S%G1063><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Thou Mayest Commit Adultery, <S%G3431><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> Also, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Thou Mayest Not Commit Murder. <S%G5407><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Now If <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756><s%> , Thou Shalt Not Commit Adultery, <S%G3431><s%> Shalt Commit Murder <S%G5407><s%> But, <S%G1161><s%> Thou Hast Become <S%G1096><s%> A Transgressor <S%G3848><s%> Of The Law <S%G3551><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> Speak Ye <S%G2980><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Do, <S%G4160><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> By The <S%G1223><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Of Freedom <S%G1657><s%> Being About <S%G3195><s%> To Be Judged; <S%G2919><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For Judgment Will Be <S%G2920><s%> Without Mercy <S%G448><s%> To Him That <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Wrought Not <S%G4160><s%> Mercy. <S%G1656><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Boasts Over <S%G2620><s%> Mercy <S%G1656><s%> Judgment. <S%G2920><s%>

What Is <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Profit, <S%G3786><s%> <S%G80><s%> My Brethren, <S%G3450><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> He Has, <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2041><s%> But Works <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2192><s%> Have Not? <S%G3361><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> To Save <S%G4982><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> Now If <S%G1161><s%> A Brother <S%G80><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> A Sister <S%G79><s%> Naked <S%G1131><s%> Be, <S%G5225><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Destitute <S%G3007><s%> May Be <S%G5600><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Daily <S%G2184><s%> Food, <S%G5160><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Say <S%G1161><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> From Amongst <S%G1537><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Peace; <S%G1515><s%> Be Warmed <S%G2328><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Filled; <S%G5526><s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1325><s%> But Give Not <S%G1161><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Needful Things <S%G2006><s%> For The <S%G3588><s%> Body, <S%G4983><s%> What Is <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Profit? <S%G3786><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> Will Say <S%G2046><s%> Some One, <S%G5100><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Hast <S%G2192><s%> And I 2504 P-1NS-C Works 2041 N-APN Have. 2192 V-PAI-1S Shew 1166 V-AAM-2S Me 3427 P-1DS 3588 T-ASF 4102 N-ASF Thy Faith 4675 P-2GS From 1537 PREP 3588 T-GPN Works 2041 N-GPN Thy, 4675 P-2GS And I 2504 P-1NS-C Will Shew 1166 V-FAI-1S Thee 4671 P-2DS From 1537 PREP 3588 T-GPN 2041 N-GPN My Works 3450 P-1GS 3588 T-ASF Faith 4102 N-ASF My. 3450 P-1GS

Thou <S%G4771><s%> Believest <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Thou Doest; <S%G4160><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demons <S%G1140><s%> Believe, <S%G4100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shudder. <S%G5425><s%>

<S%G2309><s%> But Wilt Thou <S%G1161><s%> Know, <S%G1097><s%> O 5599 INJ Man 444 N-VSM Empty, 2756 A-VSM That 3754 CONJ 3588 T-NSF Faith 4102 N-NSF Apart From 5565 ADV 3588 T-GPN Works 2041 N-GPN Dead 3498 A-NSF Is? 2076 V-PXI-3S

Abraham <S%G11><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Our Father <S%G2257><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Was Justified, <S%G1344><s%> Having Offered <S%G399><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> His Son <S%G846><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Altar? <S%G2379><s%>

Thou Seest <S%G991><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Was Working With <S%G4903><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> His Works, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Was Perfected. <S%G5048><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Says, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G4100><s%> Now Believed <S%G1161><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Was Reckoned <S%G3049><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Friend <S%G5384><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> He Was Called. <S%G2564><s%>

<S%G3668><s%> But In Like Manner <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Rahab <S%G4460><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Harlot <S%G4204><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Was Justified, <S%G1344><s%> Having Received <S%G5264><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Messengers, <S%G32><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By Another <S%G2087><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Having Put Them Forth? <S%G1544><s%>

<S%G5618><s%> For As <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> Apart From <S%G5565><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Apart From <S%G5565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>
